channel.title: Backwater Burial
channel.description: News updates, show listings, and other information about Backwater Burial.

item.title: Rock for Wishes 2008
item.description: Backwater Burial added to the Rock for Wishes 2008 lineup.

item.title: Cincinnati Dates Booked
item.description: Two shows booked at The Blue Note in Cincinnati.

item.title: Rich City Tattoo Expo and Web Update
item.description: Information about the Rich City Tattoo Expo and the latest web update.

item.title: New T-Shirts in Stock
item.description: New T-Shirts are in stock and will be available online soon.

item.title: The New Demo is Finished!
item.description: Backwater Burial has finished recording a new demo album at Secret Studio in Nashville, TN.

item.title: BWB Takes 10th Place in the Battle of the Bands
item.description: Backwater Burial advanced to the final round and received 10th place in the Lake Cumberland Battle of the Bands.

item.title: Online Poll for the Battle of the Bands
item.description: There is an online poll for the Battle of the Bands this weekend. The winner of this poll will get a "special" award after the battle.

item.title: Louisville Show Date Changed
item.description: The Louisville show has been changed to January 31st.

item.title: Rocktoberfest 2007
item.description: Backwater Burial introduced the new frontman, Metal Mike, at Rocktoberfest 2007 in London, KY.
